TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void NewConnectionHandler(object o, NewConnectionArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed NewConnectionHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the NewConnectionHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the NewConnectionHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the NewConnectionHandler is removed from the event.
